thread.title: Playboy brings back nudity after nixing it a year ago
thread.title_full: Playboy brings back nudity after nixing it a year ago

title: Playboy brings back nudity after nixing it a year ago
text: That didn't last long! Playboy returns to nudity one year after it nixed naked models in an effort to revamp its image Nude models will be gracing the pages of Playboy again in the March/April issue It stopped featuring nudity in March 2016, a decision meant to boost its profile on news stands and attract more advertisers But the experiment apparently failed and Playboy is now reverting to its ways Full frontal nudity is not included and the tagline 'Entertainment for Men' has been removed from the cover, with the website touting 'Entertainment for All' Cooper Hefner, Hugh Hefner's son and Playboy's chief creative officer said: 'Today, weâ€™re taking our identity back and reclaiming who we are'
